### Illumina NovaSeq 6000, S2 – Whole Exome Sequencing
#### Submission of 24 samples (plus multiples of 12)
#### Offer ends 30 September 2017 
* SureSelect XT2 Human All Exon v6 (58Mb)
* 100X raw coverage (5.8 Gb per sample)
* Analysis includes reference mapping (BWA) and variant calling (GATK)
* Raw data (FASTQ), alignments (BAM) and variant calls (VCF) provided 

####Sample Requirements:
* 3 μg of DNA per sample requested (≥100 ng/μl)
* DNA should be high molecular weight (≥ 20 Kb) and free of RNA as assessed by gel electrophoresis
* DNA should have an A260/280 ratio of 1.8 – 2.0
